Detailed Description

Merge multiple domains into a single accessible domain.

void cubescript::domain_chain::register_symbol ( const std::string &  id,
symbol *  s 
) [virtual]

Register a symbol.

Parameters:
id name of symbol
s pointer to symbol object.
The domain class does not hold responsibilty for the deletion of its registered symbol objects - the domain maintains a weak ownership of these symbols. Note: registered symbols MUST live as long as the dependant domain.

If the given id argument conflicts with a prior symbol registration, the existing symbol reference will be overwritten.

Reimplemented from cubescript::domain.

id name of symbol.
search_global search global domain if value is true.
Returns:
pointer to a symbol object, if symbol not found value is NULL.

Todo:
Replace this function for a push_domain param.

void cubescript::domain_chain::adopt_symbol ( symbol *   )  [virtual]

Give ownership of symbol to domain object.

Adopted symbols are deleted in the domain's destructor. This method should be used when the original owner of the symbol will not be keeping a reference of it.

Warning:
The class maintains no safety against duplicate admissions and doesn't check if adopting symbols are registered with the domain.

Reimplemented from cubescript::domain.
